EventProc/python/ecalDigis.py

00001 #!/usr/bin/python
00002 
00003 from LDMX.Framework import ldmxcfg
00004 
00005 ecalDigis = ldmxcfg.Producer("ecalDigis","ldmx::EcalDigiProducer")
00006 
00007 # set the mean noise in sim-MEV units
00008 ecalDigis.parameters["meanNoise"] = 0.015
00009 # set the readout threshold in sim-MEV units
00010 ecalDigis.parameters["readoutThreshold"] = ecalDigis.parameters["meanNoise"]*3
